description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Journey to the top in your quest for the lost gems. The gems must be retrieved and re-forged to break the spell that cast the human race to the depths of the ocean. Enjoy a classic platformer with modern twists.  Journey to the top for the fate of the human race depends on you!
description.short: Journey to the top in your quest for the lost gems. The gems must be retrieved and re-forged to break the spell that cast the human race to the depths of the ocean. Enjoy a classic platformer with modern twists.  Journey to the top for the fate of the human race depends on you!
